Writer. Journalist. Raconteur.

I live in Cape May, New Jersey, USA, where I write about politics, culture, science, history, religion and travel. I look a bit like if Hagrid ate Harry. I hate bullies no matter what side they’re on. I'm kind, until you push me. Three kids. Seven grands. Running out of f*cks.

Phillies. Eagles. Liverpool.

There are some who call me—Tim.
